snippet: Three brothers of Liu Xiaobo, the imprisoned dissident writer who was given the Nobel Peace Prize last year, were allowed to visit him in a prison in northeast China.
lead_paragraph: Three brothers of Liu Xiaobo, the imprisoned dissident writer who was given the Nobel Peace Prize last year, were allowed to visit him in a prison in northeast China.

headline.main: Brother of Jailed Chinese Dissident Reports Prison Visit
headline.print_headline: China: Dissident's Brothers Allowed to Visit Him in Prison
